content.question: A disk that is initially at rest is set into motion with a constant angular acceleration <math alttext="alpha" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>α</mi></mstyle></math>. Which of the following expressions correctly represents the angular speed of the disk after it has made the first complete revolution?

choices.label: <math alttext="the square root of 2 pi alpha, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msqrt><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>α</mi></mrow></msqrt></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="the square root of 4 pi alpha, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msqrt><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>α</mi></mrow></msqrt></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the square root of 4 pi alpha, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msqrt><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>α</mi></mrow></msqrt></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
